text: Mu by’ukuri Allah yagize ukuri inzozi z’Intumwa ye (Muhamadi). Rwose Allah nabishaka, muzinjira mu Musigiti Mutagatifu wa Maka mutekanye, nta bwoba mufite; (bamwe) mwogoshe imitwe yanyu (abandi) mugabanyije (imisatsi, nk’uko bikorwa mu mutambagiro mutagatifu). (Allah) yari azi neza ibyo mutari muzi, nuko abibahinduriramo intsinzi ya bugufi
